snippet: Point guard Deron Williams is in a walking boot, but the Nets expect him to be ready for the start of training camp on Oct. 1.
abstract: Brooklyn Nets point guard Deron Williams sprains his right ankle while working out, but is expected to be ready to participate when training camp begins on Oct 1; other basketball news noted.
lead_paragraph: Point guard Deron Williams is in a walking boot, but the Nets expect him to be ready for the start of training camp on Oct. 1.

headline.main: Nets’ Williams Sprains Ankle in Workout
headline.print_headline:
Nets Guard Williams
Injures Right Ankle
